select * from ( SELECT s.staff_name, s.staff_code, ( SELECT s.label FROM sys_dict_item s WHERE s.id = f.type and s.type='YGJCLB' ) type, f.content, f.amount, f.reason, f.remarks, ( SELECT u.USER_NAME FROM mp_user u WHERE u.id = f.MODIFIER_CODE ) modifier_name, f.MODIFIED_TIME, ( SELECT u.USER_NAME FROM mp_user u WHERE u.id = f.CREATOR_CODE ) create_name, f.CREATED_TIME, CASE WHEN f.choice = 0 THEN '奖励' WHEN f.choice =1 THEN '惩罚' END choice FROM mp_staff_rewards_pulishments f LEFT JOIN mp_staff s ON s.ID = f.SATFF_ID LEFT JOIN mp_userpost u on u.USER_ID =s.USER_ID AND u.MAIN_POST = 1 )t where 1=1
and CONCAT( t.staff_name, t.staff_code) LIKE concat('%',#{searchText},'%')
